entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
